name: PulseMax Wireless Noise-Canceling Headphones
description: Experience immersive sound with the PulseMax Wireless Noise-Canceling Headphones. Designed for audiophiles and casual listeners alike, these headphones feature advanced noise-canceling technology, ensuring you stay focused on your music or calls. With up to 30 hours of battery life, ergonomic ear cups, and Bluetooth 5.3 connectivity, the PulseMax delivers comfort, style, and exceptional sound quality for all-day wear.
